entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Earthquake Network
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º99,99 â†’ â‚º49,99 [â‚º49,99 ~ â‚º99,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º49,99

In-App Purchases

  • Priority 10k for 1 monthï¼šâ‚º6,49
  • Priority 100k for 1 monthï¼šâ‚º2,99
  • Priority 10k for 1 yearï¼šâ‚º79,99
  • Priority 100k for 1 yearï¼šâ‚º49,99
  • Priority 10k for lifetimeï¼šâ‚º249,99
  • Priority 100k for lifetimeï¼šâ‚º199,99
  • PRO versionï¼šâ‚º99,99
  • PRO version discountedï¼šâ‚º99,99

Application Description

Earthquake Network is the most comprehensive app on earthquakes and for most world countries it is the only earthquake early warning system for receiving real time alerts. Earthquake Network gives you: - Real time alerts if you live close to the epicentre - Alerts seconds in advances if you live far from the epicentre - Real time user reports on felt earthquakes - Free earthquake data from 21 seismic networks including U.S., Puerto Rico, India, Indonesia, Turkey, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, Argentina, Venezuela, Dominican Republic, Colombia, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, China, New Zeland, Japan, Italy, Croatia, Spain and Greece The Earthquake Network research project (https://www.sismo.app) aims at developing a smartphone-based earthquake early warning system able to detect earthquakes in real time and to alert the population in advance. Smartphones are able to detect earthquakes thanks to the accelerometer on-board each device. When an earthquake is detected, users with the application installed are immediatly alerted. Since earthquake waves travel at around 5 km/s it is possible to alert the population not yet reached by the damaging waves of the earthquake. For the scientific details about the project please refer to the scientific paper on Frontiers at https://bit.ly/2C8B5HI Subscriptions: When an earthquake is detected in real time by smartphones near the epicenter, the server sends an alert to all users with the app. Alerting all users can take up to 10 seconds since it is not technically feasible to do so instantly. Now you can join the priority lists of the first 10,000 or 100,000 people alerted in real time. The following subscriptions are available: - Subscription 10k for 1 year - Subscription 10k for 1 month - Subscription 100k for 1 year - Subscription 100k for 1 month â€¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period â€¢ Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal â€¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase â€¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable Privacy: https://www.sismo.app/privacy Terms and conditions: https://www.sismo.app/terms-conditions

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼šâ‚º449,99 â†’ â‚º39,99 [â‚º19,99 ~ â‚º449,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼šâ‚º39,99

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features youâ€™ll love: â€¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. â€¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. â€¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) â€¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. (Premium) â€¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. Â» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. Â» How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! Â» How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. Â» How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. â€“ TRY PLAYNAV NOW! â€“ Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: â€¢ iOS 15 or higher. â€¢ 3G connection or higher. Â» Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: The Greedy Cave
entry.summary: Coupon of the Greedy Cave: â‚º129,99 â†’ â‚º39,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy Caveï¼šâ‚º129,99 â†’ â‚º39,99 [â‚º39,99 ~ â‚º179,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º4,99

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy Caveï¼šâ‚º39,99
  • Package8ï¼šâ‚º2.299,99
  • Package7ï¼šâ‚º1.299,99

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features Â·Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! Â·Hundreds of monsters to defeat! Â·Hundreds of equipment to collect! Â·Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! Â·Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us bd@avalongames.com.cn https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DayCost Pro - Personal Finance
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º129,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º129,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget. Look at other people how to say: â— I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more. â— Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app. â— It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money. â— Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really. â— I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app! Apple Watch: You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month. Featureï¼š â— Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category â— iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen â— Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data â— Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates â— Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster â— Full gestures: fast billing basic â— Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand â— iCloud backup & restore â— Dropbox backup & restore â— Export data to CSV via Email â— Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options. â— Allow custom theme color and wallpaper. â— Allow add transaction from template. Basicï¼š â— Expense & Income bills can be added photos â— Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have â— Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week â— Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption â— A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize â— Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs â— Supports iPhone & iPad â— Daily reminder Increaseï¼š â— Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly â— You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency If you give up because of difficulties If you give up because of busy If you want to know where expenses If you want to save money If ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ Try our "DayCost" it, she will be your best assistant URL Schemes: DayCost:// Help translate DayCost: Contribute to the DayCost translation in your language. Let's make DayCost available to everyone in the world! We will show translator's info in DayCost, if you so desire. In addition, we also give several redemption code as a gift. have any suggestions or comments, please write to usï¼šsupport@daycost.com

entry.title: Hitman: Blood Money â€” Reprisal
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º429,00 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º429,00]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game Unlockï¼šâ‚º429,00

Application Description

PLAY THE FIRST MISSION FOR FREE Begin your killer career with the first of Blood Moneyâ€™s massively replayable sandbox missions, then unlock the complete game with a single in-app purchase. === You are Agent 47 â€” a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, â€œThe Franchiseâ€. Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracyâ€™s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected. Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic â€” complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support. EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Moneyâ€™s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs. THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic â€œaccidentsâ€. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff. INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways â€” the hallmarks of a professional assassin. ONE STEP AHEAD An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion. COMPLETE CONTROL Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips. === We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money â€” Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues. Supported iPhones: â€¢ iPhone 8 Plus and later â€¢ iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later Supported iPads: â€¢ iPad mini 5 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Air 3 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad 7 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only â€¢ iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later â€¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com Hitman: Blood Money Â© 2000-2025 IO Interactive A/S. IO Interactive, IOI, HITMAN are registered trademarks of IO Interactive A/S. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

Application Screenshot

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features Â·Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! Â·Hundreds of monsters to defeat! Â·Hundreds of equipment to collect! Â·Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! Â·Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us bd@avalongames.com.cn https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Application Description

Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. The war is â€˜overâ€™ - but we all know that doesnâ€™t mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power! Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of â€˜Plague Inc.â€™ - one of the most popular paid games ever with over 130 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency. â—ˆâ—ˆâ—ˆ #1 top paid game globally â—ˆâ—ˆâ—ˆ â–¶ â€œRebel Inc. lets everyone wrestle with the messy challenges of post-conflict recovery and better understand the complex realities of building peace.â€ - World Bank Global Lead for Stability, Peace and Security â–¶ "Highly rewarding spiritual sequel to one of the App Store's biggest hits." - Pocket Tactics â–¶ "Surprisingly sophisticated... even better than some of the stabilization training software I have seen in government use" - PAXsims â–¶ "Rebel Inc. is fascinating and fun" - 148Apps.com â–¶ "Another great game and a worthy successor to Plague Inc" - App Store review â–¶ "If you love strategy games then this is the game for you" - App Store review â–¶ "Brilliant game, the gameplay is interesting and the strategy is intuitive!" - App Store review â–¶ "Unlike anything Iâ€™ve played on here before" - App Store review â—ˆâ—ˆâ—ˆ Features: â— Stabilise 9 richly modeled regions â— Innovative representation of counter insurgency tactics â— Fund realistic initiatives to empower the local government â— Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world based on extensive research â— Intelligent strategic and tactical AI â— Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions â— 8 unique governors with radically different abilities â— Conduct large-scale Operations in Campaign mode â— Play new generated Challenges every week â— 13 Official Scenarios including disease outbreaks, helicopters and advanced insurgents â— Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system â— Full Save/Load functionality â— Internet connectivity not required An important note: Although a fictional game, Rebel Inc. looks at important real world issues and we have made every effort to deal with them sensitively. The game has been extensively researched and has been developed in cooperation with leading regional politicians, business people and journalists as well as international charities, experts and governments. Rebel Inc. is now fully localised in English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Russian. Special sale price to celebrate the launch of the game! â—ˆâ—ˆâ—ˆ Iâ€™ve got lots of plans for updates! Get in touch and let me know what you want to see. James (the designer) Contact me here: www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support Follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations
